channel.title: Azure on Suraj Deshmukh
channel.description: Recent content in Azure on Suraj Deshmukh

item.title: Deploying Grok-3 on Azure: A Complete Guide to Running xAI's Latest Model
item.description: Learn how to deploy and configure Grok-3 on Azure AI Foundry with this step-by-step guide. Set up your own instance of xAI's powerful language model in the cloud.

item.title: Deploying OpenAI Text-to-Speech (TTS) Model on Azure: A Step-by-Step Guide
item.description: Learn how to quickly and effectively deploy an OpenAI text-to-speech (TTS) model on Azure with easy-to-follow Azure CLI commands. Boost your applications with advanced speech generation capabilities.

item.title: Open Source Confidential Containers (CoCo) on Azure
item.description: Explore how Azureâ€™s support for nested confidential compute unlocks a straightforward path to deploying Confidential Containers (CoCo), ensuring enhanced data security in the cloud with ease.
